query:
SELECT
            ds.dataset_id,
            ds.extra,
            GREATEST(
                ds.modified_date,
                MAX(dp.modified_date),
                MAX(dep.modified_date)
            ) AS "modified_date"
        FROM
            dataset ds
        LEFT JOIN
            data_product dp
        ON
            ds.dataset_id = dp.dataset_id
        LEFT JOIN
            dependency dep
        ON
            dp.dataset_id = dep.dataset_id
            AND (
                dp.data_product_id = dep.parent_id
                OR dp.data_product_id = dep.child_id
            )
        WHERE
            ds.dataset_id::text ILIKE $1
            OR ds.extra::text ILIKE $1
        GROUP BY
            ds.dataset_id
        ORDER BY
            GREATEST(
                ds.modified_date,
                MAX(dp.modified_date),
                MAX(dep.modified_date)
            ) DESC
        LIMIT
            $2
        OFFSET
            $3
